channel.title: Hp help+website
channel.description: im a noob to moparscape,just got yesterday,but i wanted to know how to change monster hp?whenever i spawn a monster,i 1 hit K.O it and i realize it has 0 hp,i got 0 exp too.after that,i tried going into npc.cfg and changing the hp values.on a lvl 108 sara mage for example,it was at 0 hp,and i changed it to the normal (120 i think) and then i log back in,spawn a sara mage,attack it,and its still at 0 hp.i was wondering how to fix that,and also,how can i upload moparscape to my site so that my friends dont need to download it?

item.title: Hp help+website
item.dc:creator: @13-d3mon 13-d3mon
item.description:
@13-d3mon wrote:

[quote=“Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS, post:9, topic:327419”][quote author=13-d3mon link=topic=423808.msg3115389#msg3115389 date=1264913337]
okay thanks but i cant find any .java files relating to monster hp.which on is it?and how can u make public without a router?
[/quote]


thanks for trying to help,but that video was with a router. =/

Read full topic

item.title: Hp help+website
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Lol the class files are the compiled Java files. To edit Java files download a Java editing program or use text pad or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Hp help+website
item.dc:creator: @13-d3mon 13-d3mon
item.description:
@13-d3mon wrote:

but i’ve read online that .class files were java files but now i see there is .java files.how do i edit thos?and no,i do not have team viewer,and i have no idea what it is.also,off topic,but is there any way for me to make a server public without a router?

Read full topic

[quote=“13-d3mon, post:3, topic:327419”]i did restart the server,and idk how to edit the .class files[/quote]You don’t edit the .class files.

item.title: Hp help+website
item.dc:creator: @Xillion Xillion
item.description:
@Xillion wrote:

When you edit a cfg file you need to restart the server for it to work. If you edit a Java file you need to compile and restart the server.

Read full topic
